results.title: Inhibition of AMPK through Lyn-Syk-Akt enhances FcepsilonRI signal pathways for allergic response.
results.text_hl: In vivo, @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could readily reduce vascular permeability and @<m>DISEASE_Ear_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004427 @@@ear swelling@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Anaphylaxis @DISEASE_MESH:D000707 @@@passive cutaneous anaphylaxis@@@ mediated by IgE.
